meanings.definition: Lack of a common measure or standard of comparison
meanings.sent1: The incommensurabilities between their opinions led to endless debates.
meanings.sent2: The incommensurabilities of their beliefs made it hard to find common ground.
meanings.sent3: The incommensurabilities in their tastes for music always sparked lively discussions.
meanings.sent4: The incommensurabilities in their personalities created a barrier to understanding each other.
meanings.sent5: The incommensurabilities in their perspectives highlighted the diversity of viewpoints.

meanings.definition: Inability to be compared or related in a meaningful way
meanings.sent1: The incommensurabilities nature of art and science puzzled many.
meanings.sent2: Her incommensurabilities talents made her a unique individual.
meanings.sent3: The incommensurabilities results of the experiment left the researchers scratching their heads.
meanings.sent4: The incommensurabilities qualities of the two paintings made it hard to choose a favorite.
meanings.sent5: His incommensurabilities skills in different areas made him a versatile worker.
